meanings.definition: A chronic bacterial disease transmitted through sexual contact or congenitally, characterized by painless ulcers and skin rash.
meanings.sent1: Syphilis can be spread through sexual contact.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with syphilis after seeing the ulcers.
meanings.sent3: When the syphilis rash appeared, he knew he needed medical help.
meanings.sent4: The spread of rumors in the office was like syphilis infecting the workplace.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of untreated syphilis can be severe.
